title: Better Auth Authentication Setup
description:
Integrate Better Auth Library for Complete Authentication System

Implement a comprehensive authentication system using the Better Auth library, supporting multiple authentication methods and secure session management.

Requirements:

Authentication Methods:
- Set up email/password authentication with proper validation and hashing
- Configure username-based login as an alternative to email
- Integrate OAuth providers (Google and GitHub) with proper callback handling
- Implement Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) for enhanced security
- Add passwordless authentication option (magic links or OTP)

Core Features:
- Configure secure session management with appropriate token expiration
- Store user credentials and authentication metadata securely
- Handle authentication state across the application
- Implement proper error handling for all authentication flows
- Add logout functionality with session cleanup

User Experience:
- Create login/signup UI components for each authentication method
- Display clear error messages for failed authentication attempts
- Handle OAuth redirect flows smoothly
- Provide MFA enrollment and verification interfaces
- Send verification emails for passwordless authentication

Security Considerations:
- Validate and sanitize all user inputs
- Implement rate limiting on authentication endpoints
- Use secure token storage (httpOnly cookies or secure storage)
- Handle CSRF protection for OAuth flows
- Ensure proper password strength requirements

Testing:
- Test each authentication method independently
- Verify session persistence and expiration
- Test MFA enrollment and verification flows
- Validate OAuth callback handling and error cases
- Ensure proper cleanup on logout
